item.description:
We will be meeting in E51-372

Here is a map:
http://whereis.mit.ed...
Best parking is behind E552, E53, entrance on Main Street.

For more information, see http://whereis.mit.ed...

Using financial statements to select better stocks
Presented by George Dilanni, Professor, Nichols College
George is a successful fundamental investor and an attendee of our meetups. In this talk George will:
- Show what he looks for - primarily companies that are very profitable (high return on invested capital) and generate plenty of cash.
- He will explain what the balance sheet, income statement, and statement of cash flows mean and how he uses them to evaluate profitability and cash flow.
- He will show how to use data from Yahoo Finance and Edgar 10-K documents.
- All this and his promise to keep it clear and simple.

The agenda for the meetup will be:
7:00 Greeting, followed by Fred Sears's Q&A, then Doug's Market Report
8:00 George Dilanni's feature presentation (described above)
9:00 Break followed by Stock picks discussion led by Vince Jones

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required.
item.name: The Boston Investor's Business Daily January Meetup
